content:
Glad to hear you're enjoying Elementary! Here are some other great crime dramas you can try:

1. Bosch 
2. True Detective 
3. Criminal Minds 
4. Mindhunter 
5. Line of Duty 
6. Luther 
7. Fargo 
8. Broadchurch 

These shows all have unique storytelling and complex characters that make them stand out from traditional procedural crime dramas. They are also highly praised by critics and audiences alike.
